snippet.title: Aloft | Gamescom 2024 Trailer | Into The Infinite 2024
snippet.description:
Soar the skies in Aloft, the co-op sandbox survival game set in a world of floating islands. Build any island into a skyship, your home in the clouds. Find lost knowledge, cure the fungal corruption, and brave the hurricane to restore the ecosystem. Aloft is a feel-good, cozy survival game set in the clouds, where you can transform any island into a flying ship and explore the vast skies.

Add to your Steam wishlist: https://lvli.li/AloftSteam
---
